name: readarr
description: Readarr is a self-hosted ebook and audiobook collection manager for Usenet and torrents. It integrates with Calibre, tracks authors, and automates downloads via indexers.

features.title: Author Tracking
features.description: Monitor favorite authors and automatically download new releases when they're published

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Sync with Calibre libraries to manage metadata and convert between ebook formats

features.title: Quality Profiles
features.description: Define preferred formats like EPUB, MOBI, or AZW3 and prioritize audiobook quality

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search Usenet and torrent indexers to grab books as soon as they become available

features.title: Metadata Management
features.description: Fetch book covers, descriptions, and publication details from GoodReads and other sources

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Automatically add books from GoodReads lists, reading challenges, or custom sources

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Rename and sort downloaded books into a consistent folder structure
